details.purpose: Generates SLURM job scripts for parallel scientific computing simulations

input.case_file: A file containing case definitions with columns for case name, algorithm mode, termination mode, termination value, boundary function, sample count, wall clock time, and configuration details (nodes, processors, interlines)
input.executable_file: Path to the executable file for the simulation
input.output_directory: Directory where the generated job scripts will be saved

output.job_scripts: Generates individual job scripts for each case and configuration, named after the case and configuration parameters, with extensions .job

dependencies.SLURM: Required for job scheduling and resource management
dependencies.mpiexec: Used to launch parallel MPI processes
dependencies.spack: Used to load MPI and other dependencies

resources.nodes: Number of nodes to be requested for each job
resources.processors: Number of processors per node to be requested for each job
resources.interlines: Number of interlines to be used in the simulation
resources.wall_clock_time: Maximum time allowed for each job
